pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
now there's a linking error on macOS

~~~
[100%] Linking CXX executable INTEGRATION_plugin
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "ignition::common::Plugin::PrivateGetInterface(std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> > const&) const", referenced from:
      PluginLoader_LoadExistingLibrary_Test::TestBody() in plugin.cc.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [test/integration/INTEGRATION_plugin] Error 1
~~~

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/89/console
